results.title: Mar de Frades Albariño Atlántico 2023 – a flourish of floral ...
results.content: # Mar de Frades Albariño Atlántico 2023 – a flourish of floral, fruity freshness and Spanish sea air in an ocean-blue bottle. Since its launch, the Mar de Frades winery has been at the vanguard of progress for the Rías Baixas region with a pioneering approach is due to the vineyard’s passionate entrepreneur, **Paula Fandiño** who’s known for her experimentation with the Albariño grape in particular; she is a native Galician who joined Mar de Frades in 2007 and now recognised as one of the best winemakers in Spain according to The Drink Business and Decanter, as well as selected by Wine Spectator as one of the top ten most influential women in the wine industry. Mar de Frades is one of the leading wine producers of the region and its stunning views over the Ría de Arousa estuary inspires a marine theme for its image; their wines are all presented in beautifully artistic, sea-blue bottles to reflect the fresh taste and ocean setting. This Albariño 2023 wine has deservedly been voted among the best white wines in Spain –  a stunning, unique wine, saline in character, seducing you with its freshness and complexity, embodying all the expressions of the Albariño ‘queen grape’ variety.

results.title: Home - Mar de frades
results.content: Celebramos con Mar de Frades Brut Nature esta Navidad: una mesa compartida, una risa inesperada y un brindis lleno de emoción que convierte cualquier instante en recuerdo. We celebrate this Christmas with Mar de Frades Brut Nature: a shared table, an unexpected laugh, and a toast full of emotion that turns any moment into a memory. En nuestra Finca Valiñas nace la elegancia serena, la frescura precisa y el carácter que solo da el tiempo. Este viñedo propio, situado en una de las laderas más prometedoras de las Rías Baixas, se cultiva con esmero sobre suelos de arenisca y granito, reconocidos por su excelente drenaje, que aporta la personalidad única a nuestros vinos. En la parte más norteña e interior de Rías Baixas elaboramos un albariño profundo y enigmático, un tesoro de nuestra finca Monteveiga. Mar de Frades Albariño equilibra cada plato con la frescura y delicadeza que nos caracteriza. Nuestro Albariño es frescura y sofisticación que transforma tus planes en recuerdos inolvidables.
